name: birthday
description: Set and see your friends birthdays

options.name: show
options.description: Show the birthday of a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the birthday for, default you

options.name: set
options.description: Register your birthday for calendar, horoscope, age and birthday taypoints

options.name: day
options.description: Your birthday day of the month

options.name: year
options.description: Your birthday year, if not included, your age can't be displayed

options.name: privately
options.description: If true, your birthday won't be visible. Horoscope, age and birthday taypoints will still work

options.name: age
options.description: Show the age of a user according to their set birthday

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the age for, default you

options.name: calendar
options.description: Show a calendar of upcoming birthdays in the current server

options.name: horoscope
options.description: Show today's horoscope for a given user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the horoscope for, default you

options.name: role
options.description: Configure a role to be given to server members on their birthday
